CVE-2010-2553.summary: The Cinepak codec in Microsoft Windows XP SP2 and SP3, Windows Vista SP1 and SP2, and Windows 7 does not properly decompress media files, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted file, aka "Cinepak Codec Decompression Vulnerability."

CVE-2010-3333.summary: Stack-based buffer overflow in Microsoft Office XP SP3, Office 2003 SP3, Office 2007 SP2, Office 2010, Office 2004 and 2008 for Mac, Office for Mac 2011, and Open XML File Format Converter for Mac allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted RTF data, aka "RTF Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability."

CVE-2010-4502.summary: Integer overflow in KmxSbx.sys 6.2.0.22 in CA Internet Security Suite Plus 2010 allows local users to cause a denial of service (pool corruption) and execute arbitrary code via crafted arguments to the 0x88000080 IOCTL, which triggers a buffer overflow.

CVE-2010-5301.summary: Stack-based buffer overflow in Kolibri 2.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long URI in a HEAD request.
